channel.title: [HELP] Coding a 508+ [HELP]
channel.description:
[size=24pt][u][b]~CODING A 508+ RSPS NEED HELP~[/b][/u][/size]
[size=14pt][b]I DO NOT KNOW HOW TO WORK FOR FILES ON A 508 RSPS, I HAVE CODED REALLY GOOD ON DELTA BASE. I NEED HELP CODING IT! PLEASE REPLY WITH HELP! [/b] [/size]

item.title: [HELP] Coding a 508+ [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @billyfreeman billyfreeman
item.description:
@billyfreeman wrote:

that sucks alot, cuz i go, to my moms house for 1 week, then to my dads house for 1 week, but when im gone from my moms house i cant host. cuz she dont like it!
kinda in a pickle…

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Coding a 508+ [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @billyfreeman billyfreeman
item.description:
@billyfreeman wrote:

guys, i can already host, i have players on my server everyday! and i have never portforwarded! :(, now i need to know how to port forward on a laptop with windows 7, and its wireless.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Coding a 508+ [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:9, topic:412647”][quote author=JokesOnYou link=topic=514125.msg3731556#msg3731556 date=1314656965]

~CODING A 508+ RSPS NEED HELP~

I DO NOT KNOW HOW TO WORK FOR FILES ON A 508 RSPS, I HAVE CODED REALLY GOOD ON DELTA BASE. I NEED HELP CODING IT! PLEASE REPLY WITH HELP!

Cool it with the caps.

It’s called packaging. When a server is packaged, it is alot neater. You won’t find all of your shit in client.java. It is spread out through many classes causing less stress/lag on the server providing a smoother gameplay. That’s why Delta can’t hold more than 300 players without crashing.

I recommend using an IDE. Use the search bar and type " How to run Hyperion Via Eclipse" it’s the same concept, instead of choosing the Hyperion source you choose your 508.
[/quote]He doesn’t need to host it, he wants to know how to code it. And i gave him a good link for beginners. + There is no client.java in 508. I don’t know what i was thinking when i said that.

I never said portforward. The tutorial shows how to set up your server through eclipse. Nothing about hosting it.[/quote]My bad, i mis-Intepreted that. My apologies.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Coding a 508+ [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“JokesOnYou, post:8, topic:412647”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=514125.msg3731546#msg3731546 date=1314656840]

~CODING A 508+ RSPS NEED HELP~

I DO NOT KNOW HOW TO WORK FOR FILES ON A 508 RSPS, I HAVE CODED REALLY GOOD ON DELTA BASE. I NEED HELP CODING IT! PLEASE REPLY WITH HELP!

Cool it with the caps.

It’s called packaging. When a server is packaged, it is alot neater. You won’t find all of your shit in client.java. It is spread out through many classes causing less stress/lag on the server providing a smoother gameplay. That’s why Delta can’t hold more than 300 players without crashing.

I recommend using an IDE. Use the search bar and type " How to run Hyperion Via Eclipse" it’s the same concept, instead of choosing the Hyperion source you choose your 508.
[/quote]He doesn’t need to host it, he wants to know how to code it. And i gave him a good link for beginners. + There is no client.java in 508. I don’t know what i was thinking when i said that.[/quote]

I never said portforward. The tutorial shows how to set up your server through eclipse. Nothing about hosting it.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Coding a 508+ [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“m1lkman, post:7, topic:412647”][quote author=billyfreeman link=topic=514125.msg3731372#msg3731372 date=1314653024]
~CODING A 508+ RSPS NEED HELP~

I DO NOT KNOW HOW TO WORK FOR FILES ON A 508 RSPS, I HAVE CODED REALLY GOOD ON DELTA BASE. I NEED HELP CODING IT! PLEASE REPLY WITH HELP!
[/quote]

Cool it with the caps.

It’s called packaging. When a server is packaged, it is alot neater. You won’t find all of your shit in client.java. It is spread out through many classes causing less stress/lag on the server providing a smoother gameplay. That’s why Delta can’t hold more than 300 players without crashing.

I recommend using an IDE. Use the search bar and type " How to run Hyperion Via Eclipse" it’s the same concept, instead of choosing the Hyperion source you choose your 508.[/quote]He doesn’t need to host it, he wants to know how to code it. And i gave him a good link for beginners. + There is no client.java in 508. I don’t know what i was thinking when i said that.

Read full topic

item.title: [HELP] Coding a 508+ [HELP]
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“billyfreeman, post:1, topic:412647”]~CODING A 508+ RSPS NEED HELP~

I DO NOT KNOW HOW TO WORK FOR FILES ON A 508 RSPS, I HAVE CODED REALLY GOOD ON DELTA BASE. I NEED HELP CODING IT! PLEASE REPLY WITH HELP![/quote]

Cool it with the caps.

It’s called packaging. When a server is packaged, it is alot neater. You won’t find all of your shit in client.java. It is spread out through many classes causing less stress/lag on the server providing a smoother gameplay. That’s why Delta can’t hold more than 300 players without crashing.

I recommend using an IDE. Use the search bar and type " How to run Hyperion Via Eclipse" it’s the same concept, instead of choosing the Hyperion source you choose your 508.

Read full topic

item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote=“billyfreeman, post:3, topic:412647”]i am in need of help coding the whole thing, i have never coded a 508+ so i do not know anything about it, but mostly i need, to code commands, and that thing that pops up on pi servers when u log in. it says like "welcome to "server name" updates: etc."

[size=36pt]please help! [/size][/quote]Just like 317’s (For Commands) Should have a Client.java in the source, that hold all the commands. And i do not know how to add that pop up thing in PI. Dont think its possible for 508+… Could be wrong.
